verses.verse: You are the children <WH1121> of Yahweh <WH3068> your God: <WH430> you shall not cut <WH1413> yourselves, <WH7760> nor make any baldness <WH7144> between your eyes <WH5869> for the dead. <WH4191>

For you are a holy <WH6918> people <WH5971> to Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and Yahweh <WH3068> has chosen <WH977> you to be a people <WH5971> for his own possession, <WH5459> above all peoples <WH5971> who are on <WH6440> the face of the earth. <WH127>
You shall not eat <WH398> any abominable thing. <WH8441>
These are the animals <WH929> which you may eat: <WH398> the ox, <WH7794> the sheep, <WH7716> and the goat, <WH5795>
the hart, <WH354> and the gazelle, <WH6643> and the roebuck, <WH6643> and the wild goat, <WH689> and the ibex, <WH1788> and the antelope, <WH8377> and the chamois. <WH2169>

Every animal <WH929> that parts <WH6536> the hoof, <WH6541> and has the hoof <WH6541> cloven <WH8157> in <WH8156> two <WH8147> and chews <WH5927> the cud, <WH1625> among the animals, <WH929> that may you eat. <WH398>

Nevertheless these you shall not eat <WH398> of them that chew <WH5927> the cud, <WH1625> or of those who have the <WH6536> hoof <WH6541> cloven: <WH8156> the camel, <WH1581> and the hare, <WH768> and the rabbit; <WH8227> because they chew <WH5927> the cud <WH1625> but don't <WH6536> part the hoof, <WH6541> they are unclean to you. <WH2931>

The pig, <WH2386> because it has a split <WH6536> hoof <WH6541> but doesn't <WH1625> chew the cud, is unclean <WH2931> to you: <WH1320> of their flesh you shall not eat, <WH398> and their carcasses <WH5038> you shall not touch. <WH5060>
These you may eat <WH398> of all that are in the waters: <WH4325> whatever has fins <WH5579> and scales <WH7193> may you eat; <WH398>
and whatever doesn't <WH5579> have fins and scales <WH7193> you shall not eat; <WH398> it is unclean to you. <WH2931>
Of all clean <WH2889> birds <WH6833> you may eat. <WH398>
But these are they of which you shall not eat: <WH398> the eagle, <WH5404> and the vulture, <WH6538> and the osprey, <WH5822>
and the red kite, <WH344> and the falcon, <WH344> and the kite <WH344> after its kind, <WH4327>
and every raven <WH6158> after its kind, <WH4327>
and the ostrich, <WH1323> and the owl, <WH1323> and the seagull, <WH7828> and the hawk <WH8464> after its kind, <WH4327>
the little owl, <WH3563> and the great owl, <WH3244> and the horned owl, <WH8580>
and the pelican, <WH6893> and the vulture, <WH7360> and the cormorant, <WH7994>
and the stork, <WH2624> and the heron <WH601> after its kind, <WH4327> and the hoopoe, <WH1744> and the bat. <WH5847>
All winged <WH5775> creeping things <WH8318> are unclean <WH2931> to you: <WH398> they shall not be eaten.
Of all clean <WH2889> birds <WH5775> you may eat. <WH398>

You shall not eat <WH398> of anything that dies of itself: <WH5038> you may give <WH5414> it to the foreigner <WH1616> living among you who is within your gates, <WH8179> that he may eat <WH398> it; <WH4376> or you may sell it to a foreigner: <WH5237> for you are a holy <WH6918> people <WH5971> to Yahweh <WH3068> your God. <WH430> You shall not boil <WH1310> a young goat <WH1423> in its mother <WH517>'s milk. <WH2461>
You shall surely <WH6237> tithe <WH6237> all the increase <WH8393> of your seed, <WH2233> that which comes forth <WH3318> from the field <WH7704> year <WH8141> by year. <WH8141>

You shall eat <WH398> before <WH6440> Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> in the place <WH4725> which he shall choose, <WH977> to cause his name <WH8034> to dwell <WH7931> there, <WH4643> the tithe of your grain, <WH1715> of your new wine, <WH8492> and of your oil, <WH3323> and the firstborn <WH1062> of your herd <WH1241> and of your flock; <WH6629> that you may learn <WH3925> to fear <WH3372> Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> always. <WH3117>

If the way <WH1870> is too long <WH7235> for you, <WH3588> so that you are not able <WH3201> to carry <WH5375> it, <WH4725> because the place is too far <WH7368> from you, <WH3068> which Yahweh your God <WH430> shall choose, <WH977> to set <WH7760> his name <WH8034> there, <WH3068> when Yahweh your God <WH430> shall bless you; <WH1288>

then you shall turn <WH5414> it into money, <WH3701> and bind up <WH6696> the money <WH3701> in your hand, <WH3027> and shall go <WH1980> to the place <WH4725> which Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> shall choose: <WH977>

and you shall bestow <WH5414> the money <WH3701> for whatever your soul <WH5315> desires, <WH183> for cattle, <WH1241> or for sheep, <WH6629> or for wine, <WH3196> or for strong drink, <WH7941> or for whatever your soul <WH5315> asks <WH7592> of you; <WH398> and you shall eat there before <WH6440> Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and you shall rejoice, <WH8055> you and your household. <WH1004>
The Levite <WH3881> who is within your gates, <WH8179> you shall not forsake <WH5800> him; <WH2506> for he has no portion nor inheritance with you. <WH5159>

At the end <WH7097> of every three <WH7969> years <WH8141> you shall bring forth <WH3318> all the tithe <WH4643> of your increase <WH8393> in the same year, <WH8141> and shall lay it up <WH3240> within your gates: <WH8179>

and the Levite, <WH3881> because he has no portion <WH2506> nor inheritance <WH5159> with you, <WH1616> and the foreigner living among you, <WH3490> and the fatherless, and the widow, <WH490> who are within your gates, <WH8179> shall come, <WH935> and shall eat <WH398> and be satisfied; <WH7646> that Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> may bless <WH1288> you in all the work <WH4639> of your hand <WH3027> which you do. <WH6213>
